## Bar plot and density chart of Correlation between Job Satisfaction and Attrition

This code provides a bar plot of attrition rates compared to job satisfaction, grouped by gender. Here is the embedded R code chunk:

```{r}

options(repr.plot.width=8, repr.plot.height=6) 

box.attrition <- df %>% select(Attrition, JobSatisfaction, Gender) %>% 
ggplot(aes(x=Attrition, y=JobSatisfaction)) + geom_boxplot(aes(color=Attrition)) + theme_minimal() + facet_wrap(~Gender) + 
scale_fill_manual(values=c("#9FF781", "#FA5858"))

dist.satisfaction <- df %>% select(JobSatisfaction) %>%
ggplot(aes(x=JobSatisfaction)) + geom_density(color="darkblue", fill="lightblue", trim=TRUE) + theme_tufte() + xlim(range(c(1,4)))

plot_grid(box.attrition, dist.satisfaction, nrow=2)
```
